name: Sri Manjunatha Medicals
location: Main Bazaar Street, Opp. Post Office
description: One of the oldest medical shops in town. We stock all general medicines, ayurvedic products, and baby care items. Home delivery available for seniors.

name: Govt. Community Hospital
description: Government-run facility providing 24/7 emergency care, maternity ward, and general OPD services. Free treatment for eligible locals.
